Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2012 12:15PM geauxwest wrote: Ronnie, I am trying really hard to remember the 80% rule, and your post is helping as much as anything can!!! I went in for an ultrasound yesterday on a newly discovered lump that my Gyno thought was a cyst...it wasn't, but they did a core needle biopsy (4 "clicks") at the US. "Luckily" my results should be back in 48 hours so I won't be waiting too long. Though I am finding 48 hours is a lot of time in internet land!!!!!  I don't know any of my other stats, because I didn't know to know, if that makes sense (no family hx, early 30s, no kids, pretty healthy overall). Trying to keep calm and carry on, with occasional now freak out and panic moments. Breathe in, breathe out...
Posts.Title: Biopsy Results-80% rule Ronnie22 omg333
